channel.title: What do i do now?
channel.description: Well it is going to be a rough week for me, because of the face that my dad finally chose his girlfriend over me. He has numerously called me "dumb ass" and "idiot". He told me a lot of stuff just because i told him to calm down. I'm pretty depressed and i'm not sure what to do. It's kinda lookin like i will be living with my mother (which makes me pretty happy). Before i leave for my mothers should i tell my dad how i feel? or should i do it now?

item.title: What do i do now?
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Use it as fuel for your motivation to be the best you can be.

Read full topic

item.title: What do i do now?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“R A R E S, post:11, topic:365321”][quote author=blakeman8192 link=topic=461527.msg3376293#msg3376293 date=1287627366]

I understand, but what my dad is doing i know my mom would never do and would never let a guy do to me and i trust her to find a man who loves her and all that not just for sex.

It’s also very important that you do not blame yourself for the way your dad is acting.
It’s not your fault, he’s just made some bad decisions. For your own sake, never forget that it is not your fault.
[/quote]
Thanks man. . .Its weird, but i fell like the whole moparscape community is my little escape from the whole depression thing. Because mostly everyone here just want to chill and talk about things they like and their accomplishments and I would rather be here then getting bitched at. Thanks for helping me man.[/quote]No problem man, we understand.

Read full topic

item.title: What do i do now?
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

i’ve had shit with my dad too. once your with your mom, its all good (at least it was for me, and i am a mommys boy :))… idk how close u r to ur dad tho. i was way close with mine

item.title: What do i do now?
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

[quote=“blakeman8192, post:8, topic:365321”][quote author=R A R E S link=topic=461527.msg3376274#msg3376274 date=1287626526]

My dad pulled the same shit with me. I haven’t seen him since I was 13.
I’m 18 now.

And no, you never really get over it.

Any advice for him and others?
[/quote]I tried for a long time to reach out to him and re-establish our previously awesome relationship.
He’s just changed, he doesn’t talk to anyone in our family anymore or anything.

I don’t know what to say really, I’m at the point where I hate my dad and I’m no longer willing to talk to him even if he apologizes.
All I can recommend is that you try to keep him in your life as much as you can before you call it quits.

My dad pulled the same shit with me. I haven’t seen him since I was 13.
I’m 18 now.

And no, you never really get over it.

I just can’t take his shit. Not with all the pressure on top from school. My mom called me the other day and just because i’m closer to my mom than my dad doesn’t make me a momma’s boy he says that all the fucking time and i’m tired of that too, but anyway my mom called me and wanted me to stay with her so i guess thats what i’m doing at least she isn’t a bitch

You should choose to live your life the best way that works for you.
Whatever will cause you the least stress and will allow you to focus most on your life goals is the best living situation for you.

Sorry man. I’m just saying that my dad loves pussy more than me and i’m gonna respect that and leave his ass my mom loves me and she doesn’t have a fucking boyfriend to be a dick to me it will just be me my mom and my bro

It’s wrong for your dad to choose a girl over you, but you need to realize that your parents will move on and find new partners in life. It’s important, for your mother’s sake, that you be understanding when she meets a guy and/or gets a boyfriend. She’s probably going through a lonely time in her life (if your parents recently split up) and she is a person too. Try not to make her (and her new boyfriend’s) life hell if she finds another guy to be with.[/quote]
I understand, but what my dad is doing i know my mom would never do and would never let a guy do to me and i trust her to find a man who loves her and all that not just for sex.

Read full topic

You should choose to live your life the best way that works for you.
Whatever will cause you the least stress and will allow you to focus most on your life goals is the best living situation for you.

Sorry man. I’m just saying that my dad loves pussy more than me and i’m gonna respect that and leave his ass my mom loves me and she doesn’t have a fucking boyfriend to be a dick to me it will just be me my mom and my bro[/quote]
It’s wrong for your dad to choose a girl over you, but you need to realize that your parents will move on and find new partners in life. It’s important, for your mother’s sake, that you be understanding when she meets a guy and/or gets a boyfriend. She’s probably going through a lonely time in her life (if your parents recently split up) and she is a person too. Try not to make her (and her new boyfriend’s) life hell if she finds another guy to be with.

item.title: What do i do now?
item.dc:creator: @all_day All Day
item.description:
@all_day wrote:

Live with your mom. Have your mom have full custody of you, if your father declines, take him to court and sue him.
